column4: niqemuckrud: I got a quick question its not to difficult but here goes when I installed qemu and kqemu it siad that the kqemu acclorator did not work good if you had Xen on your host well I donot have Xen on host but when I install guest linux I will also put Xen on the guest OS whats your thoughts?
